name: ABC Lore: Zombie online
description:
Welcome to ABC Lore, the alphabet-themed shooter game that pits numbers against zombie letters of the alphabet in a battle for survival. In the main "Zombie" mode, you'll have to use all of your skills and strategy to defeat waves of undead alphabet characters from the mysterious Lore. But you won't be alone - invite your friends to join you in coop mode and take on the zombie threat together.

As you fight off the hordes of zombie letters, you'll have a few tricks up your sleeve to help you survive. Use your resources to build barricades and fortify your position against the undead onslaught. And when the going gets tough, visit the in-game store to buy new weapons and upgrades to give you the edge in battle.

But that's not all - ABC Lore also features a variety of online multiplayer modes where you can compete against other players from around the world. Choose from four thrilling modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Gun Game, and Capture the Flag. In Deathmatch, it's every player for themselves as you battle it out to be the last one standing. Team Deathmatch lets you team up with friends or other players to take on the opposition. Gun Game adds a twist by giving you new weapons as you eliminate enemies, and Capture the Flag tasks you with taking control of enemy territory.

With fast-paced gameplay, intuitive controls, and endless alphabet-filled challenges, ABC Lore is the ultimate online zombie shooter experience. Can you survive the alphabet apocalypse and emerge victorious? Play now and find out.
